text: Stepan Voitko (, ; 22 February 1947) is a former professional Soviet football defender and later Soviet and Ukrainian coach. ==References == ==External links== * * Hadzheha, V. Stepan Voitko: "For my work football appreciated me hundredfold (Степан Войтко: "За мої труди футбол віддячив мені сторицею"). title: Stepan Voitko
